response.overview: Max Simkin repairs shoes in the same New York shop that has been in his family for generations. Disenchanted with the grind of daily life, Max stumbles upon a magical heirloom that allows him to step into the lives of his customers and see the world in a new way. Sometimes walking in another man's shoes is the only way one can discover who they really are.
response.tagline: Saving the neighborhood one sole at a time.
response.title: The Cobbler

titles.title: Mr Cobbler e la bottega magica
